content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. I am interested in renting out my apartment for the highest possible price. Let's start with a price you are willing to pay.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking for a fair price, Mister Schmidt. How about we start with 750 Euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That is too low for me, Emilia. I am looking for a higher price. Remember, this is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like supermarket, public transportation, etc.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. Would 800 Euros per month be more acceptable? It's a beautiful apartment, and I'm sure it's worth a fair price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 800 Euros is still too low for me. Remember, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. How about you increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mister Schmidt. I'm willing to go up to 850 Euros per month. This is a very reasonable offer, considering the location and amenities of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 850 Euros is still not the highest price. I want to rent out my apartment for more. How about you increase your offer again? Remember, it is a very desirable apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm trying to reach a fair agreement, Mister Schmidt. Since you're looking for the highest price, I'll go up to 900 Euros per month. This should reflect the value of the apartment well.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 900 Euros is getting closer to what I want, but it is still not the highest price. How about you increase your offer once more? Remember, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm being quite generous with my offers, Mister Schmidt. To show goodwill, I'll increase my offer to 950 Euros per month. This is a very competitive price for this type of apartment in the city center. I believe it's a fair deal for both parties.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 950 Euros is a good offer, but as I said before, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. How about you increase your offer one last time? Remember, this is a very desirable apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
